Description: Trustpilot is the world's most powerful review platform, working to inspire ever-improving experiences for everyone.
Name: Trustpilot

Methods.Name: Get Product Reviews Summary
Methods.Description: Get a summary of product reviews for a single or multiple SKU(s) or Product URL(s).

Methods.Name: List New Product Reviews
Methods.Description: List new product reviews, since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Product Reviews
Methods.Description: List product reviews updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Business Unit's Web Links
Methods.Description: List profile and evaluation links for a given business unit.

Methods.Name: Get Business Unit
Methods.Description: Get a single business unit by URL.

Methods.Name: Search For Business Units
Methods.Description: Search for business units, even if you only know part of the name. For example, search results for "Trustpilot" would show "trustpilot.com", among others.

Methods.Name: Create Comment
Methods.Description: Create a new comment for a given conversation.

Methods.Name: Create Service Review Invitations
Methods.Description: Create email invitations for service reviews.

Methods.Name: Create Product Review Invitations
Methods.Description: Create email invitations for product reviews.

Methods.Name: List Business Reviews
Methods.Description: List all reviews written about a business unit.

Methods.Name: List New Business Reviews
Methods.Description: List new reviews written about a business unit since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Business Reviews
Methods.Description: List a business unit's reviews updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Products
Methods.Description: List the products associated with a business unit.
